title: Ricomida
description: Ricomida is a group established to empower women in Bolivia, allowing them to earn money. Ricomida restaurants (named after "rica comida," delicious food) are run by individual women and have a common branding of green decor. This is a small restaurant offering a typical vegetarian buffet-style 'almuerzo completo' at lunchtimes - soup, salad, a hot dish, and a small dessert.
